text: Kopsia sleesiana is a species of plant in the family Apocynaceae. It is endemic to the Sarawak region of Malaysia, on the island of Borneo.World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Kopsia sleesiana. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ==References== sleesiana Category:Endemic flora of Borneo Category:Flora of Sarawak Category:Plants described in 1973 Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Kopsia sleesiana
